data.text:
Deputy Chief of Party and Commercial Sector Lead, Recycling in Jordan Activity Razan Quossous

Razan Quossous is an economic growth expert with more than 20 years of experience in the sector. Razan currently serves as the deputy chief of party and commercial sector lead for the USAID Recycling in Jordan Activity. Her technical expertise includes strengthening business enabling environments, economic reform, increasing access to finance, private sector development, investment promotion, private sector engagement, government and municipal reform, and policy development. Throughout her work experience, she has worked closely with the public and private sectors, providing project management and implementation support to projects funded by USAID, the Millennium Challenge Corporation, the European Union, German Society for International Cooperation, and the World Bank. Her work helps expand financial services and lending products and strengthens the business enabling environment for enterprises to promote economic growth and employment opportunities.
